thread.title: Watch: ‘Aladdin’ cast reunite and sing 23 years later
thread.title_full: Watch: ‘Aladdin’ cast reunite and sing 23 years later | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Watch: ‘Aladdin’ cast reunite and sing 23 years later
text:
This year marks the 23rd anniversary of the release of Disney’s “Aladdin.”
>> Read more trending stories
To celebrate the occasion and the upcoming release of the film on new platforms, the original cast and crew reunited on “Good Morning America” to talk about their experiences with the film. The voice talent for Jasmine and Aladdin, Lea Salonga and Brad Kane, performed a stunning duet live while Oscar-award winning songwriter Alan Menken keyed the melody on the piano.
The magical song starts at 1:55.
“ Aladdin: Diamond Edition ” is available on Digital HD and Disney Movies Anywhere now and will be available on Blu-Ray on Oct. 13.
